sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-scroll'; import axios from 'axios'; import 'animate.css'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [skills, setSkills] = useState([]); const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]); const [certificates, setCertificates] = useState([]); const [contactForm, setContactForm] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const [formStatus, setFormStatus] = useState(''); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/skills').then(res => setSkills(res.data)); axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/projects').then(res => setProjects(res.data)); axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/certificates').then(res => setCertificates(res.data)); }, []); const handleContactSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/contact', contactForm); setFormStatus('Message sent successfully!'); setContactForm({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); } catch (error) { setFormStatus('Failed to send message.'); } }; return (
{/* Navbar */}
Panga Syamsundar Rao
{['Home', 'Skills', 'Projects', 'Certificates', 'Experience', 'Education', 'Contact'].map((item, idx) => ( setActiveSection(item.toLowerCase())} className={`cursor-pointer hover:text-purple-300 transition-colors duration-300 font-semibold text-lg animate__animated animate__fadeInDown animate__delay-${idx + 1}s`} > {item} ))}
{/* Home */}

Welcome to My Portfolio

I am a well-organized, energetic, and goal-oriented fresher, possessing positive attitude, problem-solving, and leadership skills with flair to explore suitable avenues in software development with good knowledge in Java, frontend development, C, and Oracle. To work in an organization that provides me with ample opportunities to enhance my skills and knowledge along with contributing to the growth of the organization.

{/* Skills */}

Skills

{skills.map(skill => (
{skill.name}
))}
{/* Projects */}

Projects

{projects.map(project => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

View Project
))}
{/* Certificates */}

Certificates

{certificates.map(cert => (

{cert.name}

{cert.issuer} - {cert.year}

))}
{/* Experience */}

Experience

Full Stack Developer

Bluepal - Present

Working as a Full Stack Developer, contributing to web application development using Java, React, and other modern technologies.

Full Stack Java Developer Course

Naresh I Technologies, Hyderabad - Ongoing

Currently pursuing a comprehensive course in full-stack development with Java, React, and MySQL.

{/* Education */}

Education

B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering

CT University, Punjab - 2020

Graduated with a CGPA of 7.2, specializing in software development and computer science principles.

Intermediate (M.P.C)

Sri Chaitanya Junior College, Visakhapatnam - 2018-2020

Completed with a CGPA of 8.7, with a focus on Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry.

Secondary School Certificate (SSC)

Bradlaugh School - 2018

Achieved a CGPA of 9.2, with a strong foundation in core academic subjects.

{/* Contact */}

Contact Me

setContactForm({ ...contactForm, name: e.target.value })} className="w-full p-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-400 transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-[1.02] animate-border" required />
setContactForm({ ...contactForm, email: e.target.value })} className="w-full p-3 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-400 transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-[1.02] animate-border" required />
{formStatus &&

{formStatus}

}
{/* Footer */}
LinkedIn Instagram WhatsApp Naukri
); } export default App;
